channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Key Trump ally to decide on possible run against leading Republican in 'next couple of months'
item.description: In an interview with Fox News Digital, Paxton gave more credence to the rumors, saying that despite "loving what I’m doing … I’m looking potentially a...

item.title: Don’t Substitute Tariffs for Income Taxes: You’ll Get Both
item.description: Replacing income taxes with tariffs would not work and would likely result in a higher tax burden for Americans.

item.title: Individuals receiving direct assistance won't be impacted by federal funding freeze, press secretary says
item.description: White House Press Secretary Karoline Leavitt said that a freeze on federal grants and loans would not impact programs like Social Security.

item.title: NYT Uses Anonymous Terrorist Sources For Latest Deep State Hit On Tulsi Gabbard
item.description: The Times will accuse DNI nominee Tulsi Gabbard of meeting with then-Lebanese Hezbollah Supreme Leader Hassan Nasrallah in 2017.

item.title: Trump Signs Orders Restoring Integrity And Lethality To America’s Military
item.description: Trump's orders seek to place meritocracy at the forefront of the Pentagon's decision-making.

item.title: White House asks agencies detailed questions about spending priorities
item.description: The White House on Tuesday sent federal agencies a lengthy questionnaire seeking details about their spending on leftist initiatives such as diversity...

item.title: ‘Hollywood Squares’ Remake Shows Inanity Of Our Celebrity Class
item.description: With its vapid and superficial approach, the show reveals celebrities as trite, even boring.

item.title: Trump’s first presidential trip shows his ‘man of the people’ cred after Ohio 'turning point,' WH spox says
item.description: President Trump's visit to East Palestine, Ohio, was the turning point in his election win, and inspired his first trip to North Carolina and Californ...

item.title: Quakers sue to stop ICE arrests, say churches must be sanctuaries
item.description: Several Quaker groups have filed a lawsuit against Homeland Security, demanding it restore a sanctuary policy that largely prevented immigration agent...

item.title: 'Red flag': Education activist rails against 'dangerous' Trump nominee for key education post
item.description: An education activist is speaking out on concerns she has that a key Trump nominee to the department of education has a history of being a "red flag" ...

item.title: Trump White House says N.J. drones were from FAA-authorized researchers or hobbyists
item.description: President Trump on Tuesday said drones spotted over New Jersey in recent months were authorized by the Federal Aviation Administration to fly for "res...

item.title: Trump Is Right to Curb Abuse of the FACE Act
item.description: The administration’s early moves against prosecutorial overkill for abortion-clinic protesters deserve to be cheered.

item.title: The Federal Reserve’s New Debit Card Rule Threatens Consumers and Banks
item.description: Banks will find other ways to make up for lost revenue.

item.title: From Florida To Texas, ‘Red State’ Republicans Are Subverting America First Priorities Across The Country
item.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis is having to fight members of his own party to push through legislation assisting Trump's deportation operations.

item.title: Senate confirms Sean Duffy as transportation secretary
item.description: The Senate on Tuesday confirmed Sean Duffy as secretary of the Department of Transportation.

item.title: There Is Still No Union Resurgence
item.description: Despite another year of wall-to-wall positive media coverage for organized labor, the union membership rate ticked down in 2024.

item.title: White House opens briefing seats to podcasters, influencers, independent media
item.description: The White House briefing room already has a new look under President Trump.

item.title: Trump’s 300 Executive Actions Made His First Week The Most Consequential In Presidential History
item.description: Trump’s supporters have optimism. The man who beat every unfair fight in the last eight years is on track to keep his promises to them.

item.title: Transgender service members and rights groups file suit against Trump's Pentagon directive
item.description: A group of transgender service members and rights groups are filing a lawsuit against President Donald Trump’s restrictions on transgender troops in t...

item.title: Trump’s Power Play
item.description: In his second term, he seems determined to use every lever at his disposal to advance his agenda.
